casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 27, 2011

[Cite as 05/27/2011 Case Announcements #2, 2011-Ohio-2581.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0802. State v. Sowards.

Gallia App. No. 09CA8, 2011-Ohio-1660. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of sentence, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted. Appellant’s sentence is stayed pending final resolution of this appeal.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents.
